A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thoroughly enjoyed it. Lots of times where you think you know where it's going and it surprises you with a changeup. Has the typical time/space realism problems of other Star Wars movies\, but that's a minor concern. Luke\, Rey\, and Kylo Ren are in particularly fine form throughout and strong character development is focused on Poe Dameron - not bad for a character who wasn't originally going to survive the first movie.
